title: ⚡Persistent Player⚡
description: Closing the browser while playing won't remove your current song and queue.
changes: You can play a song from a context and go away. When you come back, that song will be there along with the context and the timestamp.
Added Odia Language to the greetings.

title: ⚡Custom Playlists⚡
description: You can now create custom playlists.
changes: You can now create custom playlists, rename them, delete them.

There is a new right-click context menu that appears on the global search, album songs, liked songs and other playlists from where you can add songs to a specific playlist. In playlists section, you can also remove songs by right-clicking.
The 'Song Addition to Playlist' modal opens up and displays all your playlists in alphabetical order.

Later, we will build the 'Your Library' page, but for now, you can see all your playlists in the homepage, under the title 'Your Playlists'. You can see your last 5 recently accessed playlists on the sidebar.
Changed the look of the volume slider where it appears only on hover.

title: ⚡Stabilised Features and Simplified Approach⚡
description: Added persistency to liked songs, changed queue mechanisms, changed vibes.
changes: If you turn on 'shuffle' or change 'repeat' mode for a playlist or album, that status is stored in the database. So, even when you come back later, it is remembered.
Queue window on the right is resizable now. The last size is stored in your browser's cache so it is device specific, not account specific so you don't have to constantly change it.

You can no longer drag songs from the context queue to the priority queue and vice-versa. This prevents unnecessary bugs and stabilises queue performance. An easy mechanism is introduced, if you click and drag a context queue song right, you can add it to the priority queue and then re-arrange it from there if you absolutely need to.
You can remove songs from the priority and context queue by using the 'X' button or by dragging left.
Changed main seek slider and volume slider colour from white to purple to match the theme.

title: ⚡ Modern Queue ⚡
changes: Changed the queue to a small component from a dedicated page
Move the songs around the queue as you wish
Improved queue animations
Changed the home horizontal arrow colours for better visibility
Local cached like button to prevent appearance delay

title: ⚡ Search Function! ⚡
description: Now you can search for a song easily.
changes: Added search bar
You can add to queue directly from search
You can like from search bar as well

title: ⚡ Quality of Life Improvements ⚡
description: A lot of tiny changes to make your life easier. Still there are some very specific bugs which need to be taken care of.
changes: Liked Songs playlist with framer-motion animation
Like Songs playlist heading for easy column identification
Clickable album name on the Liked Songs playlist
Added the 'Add To Queue' button beside the heart button
You can now add songs from anywhere to the queue
You can click on album names to redirect to respective album in queue page
Added queue page animation, handled wrapping of songs at start and end

title: ⚡ New Modal Fetch Method ⚡
description: Now changing just a JSON file will automatically fetch the update details for the modal.
changes: Fixed an issue with Liked Songs playlist where in view liked songs didn't appear
Fixed seekbar and timer syncing issues when switching contexts
Corrected volume slider behavior to prevent accidental song restarts
Added smooth hover effects to the playback slider handle

title: Context Aware Playback! ⚡
description: Now the player is fully aware of exactly where your song is being played from.
changes: Isolated song playback state between Album and Liked contexts
Fixed seekbar and timer syncing issues when switching contexts
Corrected volume slider behavior to prevent accidental song restarts
Added smooth hover effects to the playback slider handle

title: Initial Release
changes: Core music streaming engine live
Supabase authentication integration
Full library and album support
